title: Greater Albion Typefounders New Releases and Updates.
content: We have just releases two new faces- Chipping and Terazza Tiling. New additions have also been made to our Helenium and Bromwich families. Samples and further information are at our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014114627/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). As always the fonts can be previewed and purchased at [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014114627/http:/new.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/gatf/).
author: Rasendyll
